name: face melter
description:
equip thyself with these holy arms, and banish these wretched beings (catch guns, shoot enemies)

Read the instructions below carefully, as I have not included any in the game itself. 

CONTROLS:

Requires an HTC Vive. Untested on other VR platforms.

  1. Hold down trigger and move your hand to a gun to catch it.
  2. Press trigger once the gun is in your hand to fire.
    1. Once your gun is out of ammo, it will automatically drop from your hand, and another gun will spawn. Catch it!
    2. Guns are either red or blue, and will hurt enemies that match its color. Watch them carefully to discern their natures.
  3. Press the side grip button to drop your gun prematurely. 

To begin, slide the box on the kiosk in front of you to the right. A set of blue and yellow particles will appear in front of you; these are where guns will be launched spawn from. After a few seconds, the fight will begin. The fight is over once the music has stopped.
